statements: SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC
SELECT location, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE country='USA' LIMIT 10
SELECT forecast_date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY location ASC, forecast_date ASC

SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE country IN ('USA', 'Canada') AND temperature < 20 ORDER BY temperature ASC
